_meanings:
{@--1@} To go up to,
go towards, go or come near, 
approach; used with or without any 

<ab>acc.</ab>; {#ita evABivartaMte#} (in dramas) are
coming hitherward or in this 
direction; {#SrAvastImaByavartizi#} <ls>Dk. 116</ls>;
{#tamarcyamArAdaBirvatamAnaM#} <ls>R. 2. 10</ls>; {#yato#}
{#yataH zawcaraRoBivartate#} <ls>Ś. 1. 23</ls> turns.

{@--3@} To face, encounter, stand
opposite to.

{@--5@} ({%a%}) To turn up,
arise, begin. ({%b%}) To appear, 
commence, break (as day).

{@--6@}
To be, exist, chance to be.

{@--2@} To
overcome, to be master of.
